section.title: Converged Demonstration Pre-requisites
section.para: The following pre-requisites are required before attempting to test the Converged Application demonstration (the demonstration):

listitem.para: Install and configure the Mobicents Binary.

Download and install the latest stable binary from http://www.mobicents.org/jainsleeplatformdownload.html. For installation instructions, refer to Installing the JAIN SLEE Server in the Mobicents JAIN SLEE Server Guide.
Install and configure Twinkle SIP Softphone.
Refer to for configuration settings specific to the demonstration.
Apache Ant is freely available from the http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi.

note.para: Ensure the ANT_HOME and JAVA_HOME environment variables point to the correct locations, and that the ant command is added to the path file.
